Portable Font Resource (PFR) - application/font-tdpfr MIME Sub-type Registration

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document describes the registration of the Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) sub-type application/font-tdpfr. The encoding is defined by the PFR Specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档描述了多用途Internet邮件扩展（MIME）子类型应用程序/font tdpfr的注册。编码由PFR规范定义。

contents.text: A Portable Font Resource (PFR) contains a set of glyph shapes. Each glyph shape is associated with a character code. The PFR format is designed to be both compact and platform-independent. It is intended to facilitate accurate rendering of fonts in all environments whether or not they have the required fonts already installed.
contents.zh-CHS: 可移植字体资源（PFR）包含一组字形形状。每个字形形状都与一个字符代码相关联。PFR格式的设计既紧凑又独立于平台。它旨在帮助在所有环境中准确呈现字体，无论它们是否已安装所需的字体。

contents.zh-CHS: 1. 本文件中使用的公约

contents.zh-CHS: 3. PFR定义

contents.text: 3.1 PFR Scope
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1 PFR范围

contents.text: A PFR contains a set of glyph shapes. Each glyph shape is associated with a character code. The PFR format is designed to be both compact and platform-independent. It is intended to facilitate accurate rendering of fonts in environments whether or not they have the required fonts already installed.
contents.zh-CHS: PFR包含一组字形形状。每个字形形状都与一个字符代码相关联。PFR格式的设计既紧凑又独立于平台。它旨在帮助在环境中准确呈现字体，无论环境是否已安装所需的字体。

contents.text: The glyph shape definitions in a PFR are resolution-independent. This allows glyph definitions to be displayed or printed on devices with a wide variety of resolutions. It also allows glyphs to be rendered at any size.
contents.zh-CHS: PFR中的轮廓形状定义与分辨率无关。这允许在具有多种分辨率的设备上显示或打印字形定义。它还允许以任何大小渲染glyph。

contents.text: 3.2 PFR Features
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2 PFR特性

contents.text: Some of the features of the PFR format are:
contents.zh-CHS: PFR格式的一些功能包括：

contents.text: - Compact representation of glyph shapes
contents.zh-CHS: - 字形形状的紧凑表示

contents.text: - Independent of byte order and operating system
contents.zh-CHS: - 独立于字节顺序和操作系统

contents.text: - Independent of output device resolution
contents.zh-CHS: - 独立于输出设备分辨率

contents.text: - Fully scalable to any glyph size
contents.zh-CHS: - 完全可扩展到任何字形大小

contents.text: - Optional inclusion of bitmap glyph images
contents.zh-CHS: - 可选包含位图图示符图像

contents.text: - Adopted as the font standard by DAVIC, DVB, and DTG
contents.zh-CHS: - 作为DAVIC、DVB和DTG的字体标准采用

contents.zh-CHS: 4. 评论

contents.text: 5. MIME Definition
contents.zh-CHS: 5. MIME定义

contents.text: The PFR media type has been previously registered with IANA as application/vnd.truedoc. In view of its subsequent widespread adoption as a standard font format by multiple standards bodies who have relationships with the Internet community, Bitstream has been asked to re-register this media type within the IETF tree.
contents.zh-CHS: PFR介质类型之前已在IANA注册为application/vnd.truedoc。鉴于与互联网社区有关系的多个标准机构随后广泛采用Bitstream作为标准字体格式，Bitstream已被要求在IETF树中重新注册此媒体类型。

contents.text: 6. IANA Registration
contents.zh-CHS: 6. IANA注册

contents.text: To: ietf-types@iana.org Subject: Registration of Standard MIME Media type application/font-tdpfr
contents.zh-CHS: 致：ietf-types@iana.org主题：注册标准MIME媒体类型应用程序/font tdpfr

contents.text: MIME media type name: application
contents.zh-CHS: MIME媒体类型名称：应用程序

contents.text: MIME subtype name: font-tdpfr
contents.zh-CHS: MIME子类型名称：字体tdpfr

contents.text: Required parameters: none
contents.zh-CHS: 所需参数：无

contents.text: Optional parameters: none
contents.zh-CHS: 可选参数：无

contents.text: Encoding considerations: Binary or base 64 required
contents.zh-CHS: 编码注意事项：需要二进制或基数64

contents.text: Security considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: 安全考虑：

contents.text: PFR uses a structure that can store glyph image data and encoding arrays. The fields defined in the PFR specification are of a descriptive nature and provide information that is useful to facilitate viewing and rendering of glyph images by a recipient. As such, the fields currently defined in the PFR specification do not in themselves create additional security risks, since the fields are not used to induce any particular behavior by the recipient application.
contents.zh-CHS: PFR使用一种可以存储字形图像数据和编码数组的结构。PFR规范中定义的字段具有描述性，并提供有助于接收者查看和呈现字形图像的信息。因此，PFR规范中当前定义的字段本身不会产生额外的安全风险，因为这些字段不用于诱导接收方应用程序的任何特定行为。

contents.text: PFR has an extensible structure, so that it is theoretically possible that fields could be defined in the future which could be used to induce particular actions on the part of the recipient, thus presenting additional security risks, but this type of capability is not supported in the referenced PFR specification. Indeed, the definition of fields that would include such processing instructions is inconsistent with the goals and spirit of the PFR specification.
contents.zh-CHS: PFR具有可扩展的结构，因此理论上可以在将来定义字段，这些字段可用于诱导接收方的特定操作，从而带来额外的安全风险，但参考的PFR规范不支持这种类型的功能。事实上，包含此类处理指令的字段定义与PFR规范的目标和精神不一致。

contents.text: Interoperability considerations: none
contents.zh-CHS: 互操作性注意事项：无
